project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to load a CSV file
Implement functionality to identify numerical columns from the CSV
Implement functionality to calculate the mean for user-specified columns
Implement functionality to calculate the median for user-specified columns
Implement functionality to calculate the mode for user-specified columns
Write tests for the implemented functionalities above including the calculations
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
